channel.title: Physical Backup on My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content in Physical Backup on My New Hugo Site

item.title: Back That Thang Up
item.description: [whitebox] [big]Today in Tedium: It’s deeply ironic that World Backup Day comes just a day before April Fools Day. One day encourages people to be stoic, serious, and overly cautious because people are inherently clumsy or devious; the other is designed to encourage people to throw caution in the wind because people are just Joshin’ you. So in honor of both days (and in an effort to counter-program against all the stupid April Fool’s emails you’re probably going to be getting in the next 24 hours), let’s talk about the nature of destructionâ€”physical things that are valuable because they can’t be backed up, getting damaged, dinged up, or destroyed.
